Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.description: 'Completing only one of Aletheia's Aletheia's simulations|trials was not enough to bind Kassandra to the power of the Staff of Hermes Trismegistus|Staff. After her time in Elysium, it was clear there was only one way forward.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'The Fate of Atlantis: Torment of Hades'
MemoryInfobox.location: Gateway to the Lost City, Thera, Greece

General_Description: '''The Second Calling''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met with [[Aletheia]] at the [[Gateway to the Lost City]] to initiate the simulation of the [[Underworld]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra approached Aletheia.
*'''Aletheia:''' ''You're needed, Keeper. Your bond with the [[Staff of Hermes Trismegistus|Staff]] is not yet complete. When you're ready, you must continue.''
(I'm ready to go.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm ready, Aletheia.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra resumed her trials of her role as the Keeper, entering Aletheia's simulation of the Underworld.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Torment of Hades]]''
